author: donaldp
msg: Incorporate additivity feature similar to Log4j.
This is needed as getLogTargets() is deprecated for security reasons (allowed masq) and yet this functionality is still needed.
Added unit tests to verify it behaves as expected.

author: donaldp
msg: Corrected license to no longer refer to Framework and also to not prefix with Apache Excalibur as it is redundent given next clause and it follows Apache conventions better.
